Room.Name: Above the Rain Clouds
Room.ShortDescription: You are high over some rain clouds. 200.n1.e0.s0.w2
Room.LongDescription: you can no longer see the ground because of the dark clouds below you. At least, however, you can see your direction indicator, and should be able to find your way back to Brownhaven. Now if you can only find a hole in the clouds, so you can go down a bit lower to get your bearings.
